title: Google Play Developer
description: Accesses Android application developers' Google Play accounts.

androidpublisher_edits_insert.title: Creates a new edit for an app, populated with the app's current state.
androidpublisher_edits_insert.description: Creates a new edit for an app, populated with the app's current state.

androidpublisher_edits_delete.title: Deletes an edit for an app. Creating a new edit will automatically delete any of your previous edits so this method need only be called if you want to preemptively abandon an edit.
androidpublisher_edits_delete.description: Deletes an edit for an app. Creating a new edit will automatically delete any of your previous edits so this method need only be called if you want to preemptively abandon an edit.

androidpublisher_edits_get.title: Returns information about the edit specified. Calls will fail if the edit is no long active (e.g. has been deleted, superseded or expired).
androidpublisher_edits_get.description: Returns information about the edit specified. Calls will fail if the edit is no long active (e.g. has been deleted, superseded or expired).

androidpublisher_edits_apks_addexternall.title: Creates a new APK without uploading the APK itself to Google Play, instead hosting the APK at a specified URL. This function is only available to enterprises using Google Play for Work whose application is configured to restrict distribution to the enterprise domain.
androidpublisher_edits_apks_addexternall.description: Creates a new APK without uploading the APK itself to Google Play, instead hosting the APK at a specified URL. This function is only available to enterprises using Google Play for Work whose application is configured to restrict distribution to the enterprise domain.

androidpublisher_edits_deobfuscationfile.title: Uploads the deobfuscation file of the specified APK. If a deobfuscation file already exists, it will be replaced.
androidpublisher_edits_deobfuscationfile.description: Uploads the deobfuscation file of the specified APK. If a deobfuscation file already exists, it will be replaced.

androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_ge.title: Fetches the Expansion File configuration for the APK specified.
androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_ge.description: Fetches the Expansion File configuration for the APK specified.

androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_pa.title: Updates the APK's Expansion File configuration to reference another APK's Expansion Files. To add a new Expansion File use the Upload method. This method supports patch semantics.
androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_pa.description: Updates the APK's Expansion File configuration to reference another APK's Expansion Files. To add a new Expansion File use the Upload method. This method supports patch semantics.

androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_up.title: Uploads and attaches a new Expansion File to the APK specified.
androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_up.description: Uploads and attaches a new Expansion File to the APK specified.

androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_up.title: Updates the APK's Expansion File configuration to reference another APK's Expansion Files. To add a new Expansion File use the Upload method.
androidpublisher_edits_expansionfiles_up.description: Updates the APK's Expansion File configuration to reference another APK's Expansion Files. To add a new Expansion File use the Upload method.

androidpublisher_edits_bundles_upload.title: Uploads a new Android App Bundle to this edit. If you are using the Google API client libraries, please increase the timeout of the http request before calling this endpoint (a timeout of 2 minutes is recommended). See: https://developers.google.com/api-client-library/java/google-api-java-client/errors for an example in java.
androidpublisher_edits_bundles_upload.description: Uploads a new Android App Bundle to this edit. If you are using the Google API client libraries, please increase the timeout of the http request before calling this endpoint (a timeout of 2 minutes is recommended). See: https://developers.google.com/api-client-library/java/google-api-java-client/errors for an example in java.

androidpublisher_edits_details_get.title: Fetches app details for this edit. This includes the default language and developer support contact information.
androidpublisher_edits_details_get.description: Fetches app details for this edit. This includes the default language and developer support contact information.

androidpublisher_edits_details_patch.title: Updates app details for this edit. This method supports patch semantics.
androidpublisher_edits_details_patch.description: Updates app details for this edit. This method supports patch semantics.

androidpublisher_edits_details_update.title: Updates app details for this edit.
androidpublisher_edits_details_update.description: Updates app details for this edit.

androidpublisher_edits_listings_deleteal.title: Deletes all localized listings from an edit.
androidpublisher_edits_listings_deleteal.description: Deletes all localized listings from an edit.

androidpublisher_edits_listings_list.title: Returns all of the localized store listings attached to this edit.
androidpublisher_edits_listings_list.description: Returns all of the localized store listings attached to this edit.

androidpublisher_edits_listings_delete.title: Deletes the specified localized store listing from an edit.
androidpublisher_edits_listings_delete.description: Deletes the specified localized store listing from an edit.

androidpublisher_edits_listings_get.title: Fetches information about a localized store listing.
androidpublisher_edits_listings_get.description: Fetches information about a localized store listing.

androidpublisher_edits_listings_patch.title: Creates or updates a localized store listing. This method supports patch semantics.
androidpublisher_edits_listings_patch.description: Creates or updates a localized store listing. This method supports patch semantics.

androidpublisher_edits_listings_update.title: Creates or updates a localized store listing.
androidpublisher_edits_listings_update.description: Creates or updates a localized store listing.

androidpublisher_edits_images_deleteall.title: Deletes all images for the specified language and image type.
androidpublisher_edits_images_deleteall.description: Deletes all images for the specified language and image type.

androidpublisher_edits_images_list.title: Lists all images for the specified language and image type.
androidpublisher_edits_images_list.description: Lists all images for the specified language and image type.

androidpublisher_edits_images_upload.title: Uploads a new image and adds it to the list of images for the specified language and image type.
androidpublisher_edits_images_upload.description: Uploads a new image and adds it to the list of images for the specified language and image type.

androidpublisher_edits_images_delete.title: Deletes the image (specified by id) from the edit.
androidpublisher_edits_images_delete.description: Deletes the image (specified by id) from the edit.

androidpublisher_edits_tracks_list.title: Lists all the track configurations for this edit.
androidpublisher_edits_tracks_list.description: Lists all the track configurations for this edit.

androidpublisher_edits_tracks_get.title: Fetches the track configuration for the specified track type. Includes the APK version codes that are in this track.
androidpublisher_edits_tracks_get.description: Fetches the track configuration for the specified track type. Includes the APK version codes that are in this track.

androidpublisher_edits_tracks_patch.title: Updates the track configuration for the specified track type. When halted, the rollout track cannot be updated without adding new APKs, and adding new APKs will cause it to resume. This method supports patch semantics.
androidpublisher_edits_tracks_patch.description: Updates the track configuration for the specified track type. When halted, the rollout track cannot be updated without adding new APKs, and adding new APKs will cause it to resume. This method supports patch semantics.

androidpublisher_edits_tracks_update.title: Updates the track configuration for the specified track type. When halted, the rollout track cannot be updated without adding new APKs, and adding new APKs will cause it to resume.
androidpublisher_edits_tracks_update.description: Updates the track configuration for the specified track type. When halted, the rollout track cannot be updated without adding new APKs, and adding new APKs will cause it to resume.

androidpublisher_edits_commit.title: Commits/applies the changes made in this edit back to the app.
androidpublisher_edits_commit.description: Commits/applies the changes made in this edit back to the app.

androidpublisher_edits_validate.title: Checks that the edit can be successfully committed. The edit's changes are not applied to the live app.
androidpublisher_edits_validate.description: Checks that the edit can be successfully committed. The edit's changes are not applied to the live app.

androidpublisher_inappproducts_list.title: List all the in-app products for an Android app, both subscriptions and managed in-app products..
androidpublisher_inappproducts_list.description: List all the in-app products for an Android app, both subscriptions and managed in-app products..

androidpublisher_inappproducts_insert.title: Creates a new in-app product for an app.
androidpublisher_inappproducts_insert.description: Creates a new in-app product for an app.

androidpublisher_inappproducts_delete.title: Delete an in-app product for an app.
androidpublisher_inappproducts_delete.description: Delete an in-app product for an app.

androidpublisher_inappproducts_get.title: Returns information about the in-app product specified.
androidpublisher_inappproducts_get.description: Returns information about the in-app product specified.

androidpublisher_inappproducts_patch.title: Updates the details of an in-app product. This method supports patch semantics.
androidpublisher_inappproducts_patch.description: Updates the details of an in-app product. This method supports patch semantics.

androidpublisher_inappproducts_update.title: Updates the details of an in-app product.
androidpublisher_inappproducts_update.description: Updates the details of an in-app product.

androidpublisher_orders_refund.title: Refund a user's subscription or in-app purchase order.
androidpublisher_orders_refund.description: Refund a user's subscription or in-app purchase order.

androidpublisher_purchases_products_get.title: Checks the purchase and consumption status of an inapp item.
androidpublisher_purchases_products_get.description: Checks the purchase and consumption status of an inapp item.

androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.title: Checks whether a user's subscription purchase is valid and returns its expiry time.
androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.description: Checks whether a user's subscription purchase is valid and returns its expiry time.

androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.title: Cancels a user's subscription purchase. The subscription remains valid until its expiration time.
androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.description: Cancels a user's subscription purchase. The subscription remains valid until its expiration time.

androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.title: Defers a user's subscription purchase until a specified future expiration time.
androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.description: Defers a user's subscription purchase until a specified future expiration time.

androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.title: Refunds a user's subscription purchase, but the subscription remains valid until its expiration time and it will continue to recur.
androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.description: Refunds a user's subscription purchase, but the subscription remains valid until its expiration time and it will continue to recur.

androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.title: Refunds and immediately revokes a user's subscription purchase. Access to the subscription will be terminated immediately and it will stop recurring.
androidpublisher_purchases_subscriptions.description: Refunds and immediately revokes a user's subscription purchase. Access to the subscription will be terminated immediately and it will stop recurring.

androidpublisher_purchases_voidedpurchas.title: Lists the purchases that were canceled, refunded or charged-back.
androidpublisher_purchases_voidedpurchas.description: Lists the purchases that were canceled, refunded or charged-back.

androidpublisher_reviews_list.title: Returns a list of reviews. Only reviews from last week will be returned.
androidpublisher_reviews_list.description: Returns a list of reviews. Only reviews from last week will be returned.

androidpublisher_reviews_reply.title: Reply to a single review, or update an existing reply.
androidpublisher_reviews_reply.description: Reply to a single review, or update an existing reply.
